column5: To you guys who weigh your fish often, I caught a smallie on the weekend that was 21" by 15".  Any thoughts on the weight?
I'm no bass expert but  It'd certainly be over 5 lbs. Probably closer to 5.75.
Thanks, I've never caught smallies over about 2 lbs, and this one was heavy.  I was guessing over 4 for sure, maybe 4.5.  Pics coming soon...
